Text: Mortdecai (film):  The film is adapted from the novel series "Mortdecai" (specifically its first installment "Don't Point that Thing at Me") written by Kyril Bonfiglioli.

Text: Mortdecai (film):  Released by Lionsgate on January 23, 2015, "Mortdecai" was a box office bomb, grossing $47 million against its $60 million budget, and received overwhelmingly negative reviews.
